channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 00:33 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Since further messages.
item.description: 游릭 00:33 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Since further messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 00:33 Driven anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 00:33 Driven anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.#Kherson_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 游릭 00:32 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 00:20 pumping anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 00:20 pumping anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
